bibl.title: Three Papyri from the Private Collection of A.M. Hakkert.
bibl.note: 1. Prose paraphrase of Fables of Babrius (?). Provenance unknown, third cent. A.D. - 2. End of a letter (?). Provenance unknown, first/second cent. A.D. - 3. Letter from Kometas to Ainesos. Provenance unknown, fifth or sixth cent. A.D.
Sijpesteijn P.J., Three Papyri from the Private Collection of A.M. Hakkert.
